meanings.definition: In a wild and noisy manner
meanings.sent1: The children laughed riotously during the birthday party.
meanings.sent2: The crowd cheered riotously at the football game.
meanings.sent3: The parrot squawked riotously, mimicking the sounds of the jungle.
meanings.sent4: The fireworks lit up the sky riotously, painting it with bursts of color.
meanings.sent5: The thunder rumbled riotously, shaking the windows with its power.

meanings.definition: In a way that is full of energy and excitement
meanings.sent1: The dancers moved riotously to the beat of the music.
meanings.sent2: The fans clapped riotously after the amazing performance.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail riotously, eager to play fetch.
meanings.sent4: The city streets buzzed riotously with life and activity.
meanings.sent5: The carnival lights flashed riotously, creating a vibrant atmosphere.
